resources.string: Enter your birthday to count the days of your life. Make each one count!
Enter your life expectancy to count the days left in your life.

Life Counter is a simple tool that shows you how many days you've lived and your age in years. It also shows you how long you have to live based on an entered life expectancy. 

The average life expectancy in the US is 79.56 years in 2015--29,058.5 days. This app is a reminder to make every day count! 

Thanks to Google for providing Android System Icons under CC-BY. Some icons were used, others modified, for the icons used in this app.
